about_the_game:
Escape from the depths of a top-secret research facility as you slash through creatures like giant mutant aliens, robot demons, and countless other experiments gone wrong while exploring underground caves and learning the origins of the world's best-kept secret. Inspired by classic games like Half-Life, Quake, Doom, and all your 90's favorites, The Enemy Below raises the bar of what a modern take on a retro-FPS can be.

Limited beta access in Q1 2021 with more news to come.
